comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks Wystan.  According the New York Times (Oct. 21, 1914 and July 9, 1914), Lewis J. Smith was the district attorney in the Carman murder trial and Charles R. Weeks was the assistant district attorney.  We will add these details when we update the database.
